testCase.requirementText: METS Profile mets/@PROFILE The value is set to “https://earkdip.dilcis.eu/profile/E-ARK-DIP.xml”.
testCase.description: This is considered out of scope. The existence of a profile-attribute is tested in the CSIP6 from the Common Specification for Information Pacakges. We have decided that it is the @OAISpackageType that states if an IP needs to live up to the DIP requirements by having the the value DIP, see the DIP3 requirement
